update KQDS_PAYCOST
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurse = #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
techperson = #{techperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalcost = #{totalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shouldmoney = #{shouldmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
actualmoney = #{actualmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
discountmoney = #{discountmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

money1 = #{money1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paytype2 = #{paytype2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money2 = #{money2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_PAYCOST set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse = #{nurse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, techperson = #{techperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, askperson = #{askperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, costno = #{costno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalcost = #{totalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, voidmoney = #{voidmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shouldmoney = #{shouldmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, actualmoney = #{actualmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, arrearmoney = #{arrearmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, discountmoney = #{discountmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paytype1 = #{paytype1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money1 = #{money1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, paytype2 = #{paytype2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money2 = #{money2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, regno = #{regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from
where 1=1
and ${key} = #{val}

select count(1) from KQDS_COSTORDER cost LEFT JOIN KQDS_reg r on cost.regno = r.seq_id left join KQDS_UserDocument u on u.usercode = cost.usercode where 1=1 and cost.status=2
and to_days(cost.sftime) = to_days(now())
and datediff(day, cost.sftime,getdate())=0
and cost.organization = #{organization}
and ( cost.createuser in (${querytype}) or cost.doctor in (${querytype}) or EXISTS (select d.doctor from KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL d where cost.doctor=d.doctor and d.costno = cost.costno ) or cost.sfuser in (${querytype}) or r.askperson in (${querytype}) or r.createuser in (${querytype}) )
and (u.usercode like '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' or u.username like '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' or ${p1} or ${p2} or u.pym like '%' + #{searchValue} + '%' )
select basetype,nexttype from KQDS_TreatItem where treatitemno = #{_parameter}
mapper.delete: delete from KQDS_JZQK where regno = #{regno} and (reggoal is null or reggoal = '') and doctor not in (select createuser from KQDS_TOOTH_DOC where regno = #{regno}) and doctor not in (select createuser from KQDS_MEDICALRECORD where regno = #{regno}) and doctor not in (select doctor from KQDS_COSTORDER where regno = #{regno}) and doctor not in (select createuser from KQDS_COSTORDER where regno = #{regno} )

delete from KQDS_JZQK where regno = #{regno} and (reggoal is null or reggoal = '') and doctor not in (select createuser from KQDS_TOOTH_DOC where regno = #{regno}) and doctor not in (select createuser from KQDS_MEDICALRECORD where regno = #{regno}) and doctor not in (select doctor from KQDS_REG where seq_id = #{regno})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KQDS_COSTORDER_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND usercode = #{usercode} AND isqfreal = 1

select SEQ_ID,createuser,createtime,usercode,username,sex,doctor,nurse,techperson, costno,totalcost,voidmoney,shouldmoney,actualmoney,arrearmoney,discountmoney, paytype1,money1,paytype2,money2,regno,organization from KQDS_PAYCOST where usercode in (${_parameter})

SELECT YEAR (createtime) 年, MONTH (createtime) 月, SUM(voidmoney + discountmoney) as totalMoney FROM KQDS_PAYCOST where 1=1 and MONTH (createtime) >= #{startmonth} and MONTH (createtime) <= #{endmonth}
and (${years})
AND askperson in (${askperson})
AND organization = #{organization} GROUP BY YEAR (createtime), MONTH (createtime) ORDER BY MONTH (createtime) ASC
SELECT count(1) FROM KQDS_PAYCOST where 1=1 AND regno=#{regno}
